word:
Washington, D. C., Friday, December 26, 1890 

     I have had a very precious blessing all night. I slept some but my heart was full of praise and thanksgiving to God. . . . My mind this night is especially elevated and I am breathing in the atmosphere of heaven. . . . I am thinking and thinking--too happy to sleep.--Ms. 53, 1890, pp. 10-11 (Diary 16, pp. 424-427). 


                                  -53-
